name: Lucid Academy German-English
description:
No ads
No in-app purchases
Works offline

Covers a variety of topics including quizzes to test what you learned.

If you enjoy learning new languages that you can use when you travel abroad or vacationing this app will help you to communicate easier.

This app is suited for all ages and presents a variety of topics in both German and English. The goal of the app is to practice common words and everyday phrases. The topics cover:

Numbers, animals, plants, colors, food, jobs, adjectives, days, months, time, travel, shopping, clothing, body, sport, weather, shapes, verbs, and conversation.

You will need to score at least 5000 points to advance from one topic to the next. You can see your score any time or turn off the music by tapping the settings' gear.
